TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAdvice extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 SAML 判斷提示內的 項目，其中包含 SAML 授權單位提供的其他資訊。

span.span: Represents the element within a SAML assertion that contains additional information provided by the SAML authority.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SAML 判斷提示中的 `` 項目是 SAML 權杖的擴充點。The `` element within a SAML assertion is an extension point for SAML tokens. 其中一個示範如何使用 類別的範例，就是提供關於發出該 SAML 判斷提示之 SAML 授權單位的支援資訊。One example of how to use the class is to provide supporting information about the SAML authority issuing the SAML assertion. 這項支援資訊可以採用 SAML 判斷提示的格式，或是成為 SAML 判斷提示的參考，分別由 以及 屬性來表示。This supporting information can be in the form of a SAML assertion or a reference to a SAML assertion, which are represented by the and properties, respectively.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫這個建構函式，而且該執行個體在序列化為 XML (透過呼叫 方法) 之前並未遭到修改，則 `` 方法會產生一個空的 項目。When this constructor is called and the instance is not modified prior to serializing it into XML by calling the method, an empty `` element is generated by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應到 `` 項目的 `` 子項目，該項目已定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 規格中。The property corresponds to the `` child element of the `` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification. 當 屬性值是 `true` 時， 屬性傳回的集合就會是唯讀的。When the value of the property is `true`, the collection that is returned by the property is read-only.
